title: Pill Gothic
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Typefaces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typefaces) : Pill Gothic**

Geometric [sans serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/sans%20serif) by [Christian Robertson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Christian%20Robertson), released in 2004 in [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Veer)'s Umbrella collection. The font contains both [OpenType](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/OpenType) and [AAT](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AAT) features, including alternate characters, [small caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/small%20caps) and [old style figures](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/old%20style%20figures).

Pill Gothic was one of the first fonts posted to [the critique area](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/forum/1) of [Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010195203/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Typophile).
author: Christian Robertson
